description: Head straight along Wo Muk Road, keeping the tall Union Plaza building on your right. Continue past the green sports fence on your left. The destination is the bus stop on the right side of the road, located directly in front of the Anchors Kindergarten.

ground_truth.target_name: Bus stop on Wo Muk Road westbound at Union Plaza in Fanling

agent_concise_description: Head straight along Wo Muk Road, keeping the tall Union Plaza building on your right. Continue past the green sports fence on your left. The destination is the bus stop on the right side of the road, located directly in front of the Anchors Kindergarten.
